system.sustained: Warlock makes Focus Power Test, for as long as they sustain power all allies in 2m x Psy Rating, +1m per Degree of Success of the Warlock are affected by the power. Anyone trying to attack such an affected ally suffer a penalty of 20+Psy Rating to Weapon Skill or Ballistic Skill Tests for that attack. Multiple instances of this power are not cumulative. The Warlock clouds the minds of oncoming attackers.
